content.question: The United States gained which of the following from the Treaty of Guadalupe Hidalgo in 1848 ?

choices.label: Control of the sugar trade with Cuba
Possession of California and most of the Southwest
The right to construct a canal across the Isthmus of Panama

content.answer: Possession of California and most of the Southwest

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
